contents:
这篇文章下有一个很明显的支那五毛操着娴熟的whataboutism话术进行回复。

The most disgusting thing is to write “支那” on those mainland businesses. I guess those students who did it forgot that they were Chinese too and forgot two generations ago how their grandparents suffered during the Japanese occupation in Hong Kong. Their ancestors died in fighting Japanese and their monuments are still in Hong Kong.
